---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/solana/undelegate/get-flow-status-withdrawn
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/b5fb1f97-bd9d-4207-bfe1-112d33309820' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `withdraw_tx_broadcasting` to `withdrawn`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "b5fb1f97-bd9d-4207-bfe1-112d33309820",
  "state": "withdrawn",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "stake_account_pubkey": "FNN2VwQy5TMkVegyXyejbwKL5S1SvRkmYHkoK62FReo7",
    "stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "withdraw_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "deactivate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "2eynfQTjXTcJSTmsVSgPKNefVLKG6sJEx1ArhtWqieHXuQ3UnYHvcvaArscjsaCz2WBuSTTALNf6rAaCj9iN8Ddk",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "delegation_active_amount": "0.0",
    "delegation_inactive_amount": "1497717120.0",
    "delegation_status": "inactive",
    "delegation_status_error": null,
    "recipient_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "withdraw_amount": "1.5",
    "withdraw_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "WmJh2w6veP3rmtUNvAA4jUNAgxS6yeJZNy6aEQWvtxBKkxCNpSGxgx1pfvC3pCLvoxin4eFHDJBrUS27P9WfSZ9",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "withdraw_transaction_funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "estimated_inactive_at": "2022-10-07T14:30:23.200Z"
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-10-05T17:37:31.573Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-10-07T18:15:45.743Z"
}
```

### Undelegation Flow Complete

Congratulations, your stake is deactivated and withdrawn to your main wallet!

:::info

If you only withdrew a portion of the stake account balance and wish to reactivate the remaining portion, simply start a new staking flow on Solana and use the `assign_stake_account` action in the first step.

:::
